user.title: VRChat Friends Setup
user.description: Instructions: 1. Log in to vrchat.com in your browser. 2. Open Developer Tools (F12). 3. Go to the Application (Chrome) or Storage (Firefox) tab. 4. Under Cookies, find the 'auth' cookie and copy its entire value.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the VRChat API. Please check your network connection.
error.invalid_auth: The authentication cookie is invalid or has expired. Please provide a valid cookie.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the logs.
